entries.title: Create PPT from Article
entries.before:
Help me create a set of Chinese PPTs that middle school students can understand based on the article below.

First write a PPT outline, planning the content of each PPT page.

Then throw the content o
entries.after: Warm academic humanism aesthetic, beige cream paper texture, serif and sans-serif pairing, terracotta and mustard palette, typography-focused grid, abstract organic line art, card structure, flat minimalist data visualization, multi-page deck format
entries.template:
Help me create a set of Chinese PPTs that <audience> can understand based on the article below.

First write a PPT outline, planning the content of each PPT page.

Then throw the content of each PPT page to Nana Banana pro to generate the corresponding PPT page, ensuring consistent style.

The specific style of the PPT should be "Anthropic/Claude style" "Warm Academic Humanism" design.

Background: Use warm beige/cream (# F3F0E9) as the base color, mimicking high-quality paper texture.

Font: Use elegant Serif for titles, and modern Sans-serif for body text.

Color Scheme: Main colors are Terracotta Red (# D67052) and Mustard Yellow (# F0B857), with Dark Navy Blue as accents. Avoid neon colors or pure black.

Visual Elements: Use a typography-focused grid layout, illustration style should be abstract, organic black hand-drawn line art, placed on solid Terracotta Red blocks, some key information uses card layout.

Charts: Flat, minimalist bar charts, emphasizing data contrast, removing excess borders.

Both text and images are generated by Nano Banana Pro, also do not turn the PPT into a single image, one image per page.

Article content is: <topic>
entries.review_reason: Complex layout workflow with specific color codes and multi-step logic requiring validation.

entries.title: Behind the Scenes of Item Creation

entries.after: Process analysis, behind the scenes inquiry, creation workflow, reverse engineering, non-visual informational task
entries.template: I want to see how <target> was made
entries.review_reason: Ambiguous prompt intent; likely a request for image interrogation/reverse-engineering or process explanation rather than image generation.

entries.title: Children's Literacy Newsletter
entries.before:
Please generate a children's literacy newsletter "Amusement Park", vertical A4, learning newsletter layout, suitable for 5–9 year old children to recognize words and identify objects from pictures.
1.
entries.after: Children's educational newsletter design, vertical A4 layout, literacy learning material, cartoon vector illustration style, high saturation warm color palette, clear object separation for identification, pinyin annotation layout, sticker style labels, picture book aesthetic, educational poster composition, clean lines, flat design
entries.template:
Please generate a children's literacy newsletter "<topic>", vertical A4, learning newsletter layout, suitable for <target_audience> to recognize words and identify objects from pictures.
1. Newsletter Title Area (Top)
Top center large title: "<topic> Literacy Newsletter"
Style: Cross newsletter / Children's learning paper feel
Text requirements: Large, eye-catching, cartoon handwritten font, colorful outline
Decoration: Add sticker-style decorations related to <topic> around it, bright colors
2. Newsletter Body (Middle Main Image)
Center of the picture is a Cartoon Illustration style "<topic>" scene:
Overall atmosphere: Bright, warm, positive
Composition: Object boundaries are clear, easy to correspond to text, not too crowded.
Scene Zoning and Core Content
Core Area A (Main Objects): Show the core activities of the <topic>.
Core Area B (Supporting Facilities): Show related tools or items.
Core Area C (Environmental Background): Reflect environmental features.
Theme Characters
Role: 1 cute cartoon character.
Action: Interacting naturally with the scene.
3. Must-Draw Objects and Literacy List (Generated Content)
Please be sure to clearly draw typical objects found in a <topic> and reserve space for labels.
(Note: The objects must be the focus of depiction; suitable for <target_audience> literacy.)
4. Literacy Annotation Rules
Label the objects with Chinese literacy labels:
Format: Two-line system (first line Pinyin with tones, second line Simplified Chinese characters).
Style: Colorful small sticker style, white background with black text or dark text, clearly readable.
Layout: Labels close to corresponding objects, not blocking the subject.
5. Art Style Parameters
Style: Children's picture book style + Literacy newsletter style
Color: High Saturation, Warm Tone
Quality: 8k resolution, high detail, vector illustration style, clean lines.
entries.review_reason: Complex LAYOUT prompt with specific text rendering instructions (Pinyin/Chinese) and structured zoning logic.

entries.title: Add Giant Creature to City Image
entries.before: Use the uploaded city photo as the base map. Do not change the real buildings, streets, vehicles or people in the photo. Maintain the authenticity of the photo. Add a very huge, stylized illustration
entries.after: Mixed media composition, photography combined with flat graphic illustration, neon color palette, surreal whimsical atmosphere, perspective layering, depth blending, mural aesthetic, visual integration, soft lighting effects, modern art overlay
entries.template:
Use the uploaded image as the base map. Do not change the real elements in the photo. Maintain the authenticity of the photo. Add a <subject> in the sky above and behind the foreground elements, as if it is overlooking the entire scene. The <subject> should be drawn in a flat graphic style, with clear outlines, and use limited neon colors (such as soft neon green, neon yellow and lime green), similar to murals or poster illustrations.
<subject> Design:
- Fantasy whimsical world, not horror or violent
- Composed of layered shapes, scales, or patterns
- Features clearly visible against the sky
Fusion with photo:
- Place the <subject> behind the edge of the buildings/foreground, making part of its body appear behind the edge, pay attention to perspective relationship
- Use correct overlapping methods: foreground edge in front, <subject> behind, making it blend into the scene
- If necessary, add very soft shadows or color reflections on the surface of nearby objects, but keep it subtle
- Maintain the original brightness of the sky, making the illustration clearly stand out
Overall atmosphere: Dreamy surreal scene, a huge, friendly illustration <subject> appears above realistic environment, combining real photos with simple modern illustrations.
entries.review_reason: Category requires manual review

entries.title: Reveal Behind-the-Scenes of Photo Creation
entries.before: I want to see the behind-the-scenes of this photo shoot and understand how it was born.
entries.after: Studio photography environment, behind the scenes aesthetic, production equipment visible, light stands, cameras, backstage atmosphere, wide angle perspective, documentary style, technical setting, meta-photography
entries.template: Show the behind-the-scenes view of <subject>, revealing the studio setup, lighting equipment, and production context
entries.review_reason: Prompt phrasing 'understand how it was born' could imply a text-based explanation request, but 'I want to see' suggests visual generation (outpainting/variation).

entries.title: Estimate Age from Face
entries.before: Create a hyper-realistic, high-resolution portrait infographic based on (your photo). Keep the identity, hairstyle, clothing, and natural skin tone of the person in (your photo) unchanged, and use a n
entries.after: Hyper-realistic infographic rendering, beauty technology aesthetic, 3D facial scanning grid, futuristic UI overlay, medical data visualization, minimalist editorial lighting, clean modern typography, holographic interface elements, neutral studio atmosphere, technical analysis style
entries.template: Create a hyper-realistic, high-resolution portrait infographic based on <subject>. Keep the identity, hairstyle, clothing, and natural skin tone of the person in <subject> unchanged, and use a neutral studio background. Overlay a subtle semi-transparent facial analysis grid on the entire face, similar to a 3D facial scan grid: fine, soft white lines extending along the facial contours, slightly glossy but not obscuring skin details. Add a clear vertical red laser line on one side of the face, like a futuristic scanning effect. All analysis lines must be soft, concise, and elegant, like a beauty technology advertisement. Create a concise medical beauty infographic using global data percentages to evaluate 5 aging factors: 1. Fine lines and wrinkles; 2. Skin texture and elasticity; 3. Facial volume and sagging; 4. Signs of aging around eyes; 5. Skin tone and pigmentation: For each factor, place a small label with a thin line pointing to the corresponding facial area, and write a short title and a 0-100% actual percentage score (based on global data) next to it. Use concise, modern sans-serif fonts and small technical style text, similar to scientific facial analysis user interface. In the bottom center of the image, display the estimated real age based on the analysis in bold large characters. Overall style: Futuristic AI-guided skincare analysis, minimalist, high-end editorial lighting, gender-neutral.
entries.review_reason: Prompt contains complex conditional logic (age estimation, data evaluation) and extensive text generation requirements

entries.title: Model Holographic Projection
entries.before:
Ultra-realistic product photo.  
Subject: virtual holographic character [CHARACTER], floating above a circular hologram projector Ø120 mm placed on a modern desk.  

Projection source rules:  
- If in
entries.after: Ultra-realistic product photography style, holographic volumetric rendering, semi-transparent ethereal texture, modern high-tech atmosphere, seamless studio lighting, cinematic depth, clean minimalist aesthetic, futuristic digital art style
entries.template:
Ultra-realistic product photo.
Subject: virtual holographic character <subject>, floating above a circular hologram projector Ø120 mm placed on a modern desk.

Projection source rules:
- If input reference is a 3D object → show a desktop 3D scanner beside the projector.
  Place the reference object on the scanner plate.
  The hologram above the projector is generated from this scanned object.
- If input reference is a 2D image → show a modern PC with monitor on the desk.
  Display the reference image on the monitor screen.
  The hologram above the projector is generated from this screen content.

Hologram rendering rules:
- Character always appears as a semi-transparent volumetric image, background faintly visible through.
- No beams, no particles, no solid statue surfaces.
- Balanced anatomy (1/7–1/8 head-to-body ratio), correct proportions.
- Natural pose with clear silhouette.
- Hair, outfit folds, and accessories visible but translucent.
- Face crisp and expressive, readable at 1000 px crop.
- No copyrighted characters, no branded designs, no IP logos.

Environment: modern desk with projector base + conditional device (scanner or monitor).
Camera: 85–100 mm lens, 3/4 hero angle, eye-level, f/11–f/16, ISO100, tripod.
Lighting: desk softly illuminated; holographic figure defined only by volumetric light.
Background: seamless black studio with subtle reflections.

Negative: text-free, watermark-free, logo-free, brand-free, copyrighted characters, franchise IP, trademarked designs, resin, PVC, physical statue, opaque surfaces, toy gloss, beams, scanlines, dots, distortion, extra digits.
entries.review_reason: Prompt contains complex conditional logic ('If input reference is...') and hardware-specific instructions that suggest a specialized workflow or agentic system.

entries.title: Contemporary Art Exhibition Space
entries.before:
An avant-garde contemporary art exhibition space themed around the reference image.
The entire exhibition hall (20.0 m x 20.0 m x 8.0 m) integrates architecture, lighting, flooring, walls, 
and ceilin
entries.after: Avant-garde architectural visualization, monumental scale, immersive lighting, polished reflective textures, granite surfaces, abstract geometric forms, stable symmetrical composition, photorealistic rendering, high contrast, atmospheric depth, precise perspective, interior design
entries.template:
An avant-garde <subject> themed around the reference image. The entire exhibition hall (20.0 m x 20.0 m x 8.0 m) integrates architecture, lighting, flooring, walls, and ceiling into the artistic expression.

At the far end of the hall stands a massive wall 20 meters wide and 8 meters high. In the center of this wall, the theme from the reference image is presented in a monumental artistic form. The image is vivid and three-dimensional, rising toward the viewer, becoming the focal point of the entire space.

A system-generated exhibition title plaque is installed below the central wall. The title must be abstract, symbolic, and poetic, and must reflect a contemporary artwork. No price display is provided.

The floor is polished granite with a reflectance of 0.35–0.40. Patterns and light derived from the reference image cascade across the surface of the work, resonating with the entire space as if responding to the footsteps of visitors. Tactile paving bricks are in a similar color, seamlessly integrated, but only 5 mm high, providing a clear texture. The work extends in a straight line from the entrance to the wall, creating a pause point before the artwork. After viewing, visitors are naturally guided to an opening on the right side (3 m wide x 3 m high). In emergencies, floor-level emergency lighting ensures illumination of 1 lux.

The left and right walls and the ceiling each reinterpret an abstract element from the reference image, transforming the entire space into a single artwork. The flow of color, form, and light unifies the experience into an artistic whole.

Visitor capacity is limited to 8–25 people. All visitors face the large wall, moving in a straight line and pausing at the designated point. No one looks back toward the entrance. Only one staff member is stationed near the right-side entrance beside the wall. All faces are blurred to ensure anonymity.

The composition is stable, with the central vanishing point always aligned with the center of the wall. Verticality is within ±0.5°. Floor reflections are precise, human figures appear natural. Hands always show five fingers, eyes are symmetrical within a 3% margin. Fabrics remain flat with no deformation.

Forbidden content: Elements unrelated to the reference image, missing or broken tactile paving, visitors facing the entrance, logos or watermarks, overcrowding, toy-like gloss, 2D flat projections, neon glow, teal-orange tones, oversaturation, perspective collapse, mismatched reflections, anatomical anomalies, extra limbs, distorted faces, excessive outlines, banding, or vignetting.

DoD: The entire venue will be a contemporary artwork centered on the theme of the reference image, with the innermost structure forming a unified experience. The tactile paving synchronizes perfectly with the flow of light, creating a clear pause point. Visitors are immersed in the space itself, and even in reproduction, SSIM will remain stable at 0.95 or above.
entries.review_reason: Prompt contains highly specific technical constraints (SSIM, Lux, dimensions) and relies on a reference image workflow.

entries.title: Create Constellation Image
entries.before:
Create an image depicting fictional constellations using the original image as a reference.
- A photorealistic starry sky. This is maintained even if the original image is anime-style.
- People, anima
entries.after: Photorealistic, celestial, starry, glowing, transparent, composite, astrological, mystical, linear, connected, night-themed, ethereal
entries.template:
Create an image depicting fictional constellations using the original image as a reference.
- A photorealistic starry sky. This is maintained even if the original image is anime-style.
- <subject> extracted from the original image are placed transparently against the starry sky background. In this case, the extracted target should be a single motif that is the main theme. Also, only one image should be placed.
- The character design, style, and taste of the original image are faithfully reproduced. The background of the original image can be ignored.
- An imaginary constellation is created based on the placed motif. This constellation is made up of approximately 5 to 10 stars.
- The pose of the original image is analyzed, and the stars belonging to the constellation are appropriately positioned in distinctive parts.
- The stars belonging to the constellation are highlighted, and the stars are connected with glowing lines.
entries.review_reason: Complex instructional prompt requiring image analysis and composite generation logic.

entries.after: Smartphone lock screen interface overlay, vertical wallpaper composition, digital UI elements, status bar integration, screen adaptation, mockup presentation style, color-matched background, realistic device rendering

The phone’s time (01:16), date (Sunday, September 16), and status bar details (battery, signal, etc.) appear overlaid on the image, with flashlight and camera icons at the bottom. The original picture is adapted to fit the elongated smartphone screen composition. The phone is placed against a background in the same color scheme.

entries.title: Make a Movie Poster
entries.before:
Analyze the uploaded photo and detect the subject, mood, and atmosphere.  
Automatically classify the photo into a suitable movie genre (romance, action, mystery, horror, etc.).  

Based on the detect
entries.after: Cinematic poster design, bold dramatic typography, genre-adaptive layout, professional text overlay, theatrical atmosphere, authentic composition, harmonized visual elements
entries.template:
Analyze the uploaded photo and detect the subject, mood, and atmosphere.
Automatically classify the photo into a suitable <topic> (romance, action, mystery, horror, etc.).

Based on the detected genre and mood, generate all the following elements in English:
- A cinematic movie title (impactful, authentic to the genre).
- A short tagline or catchphrase (1–2 lines, dramatic or emotional).
- A credit block at the bottom (with fake names for director, producer, music, etc., styled like real movie posters).
- A release note such as “COMING SOON” or “In Theaters 2025.”

Overlay these elements on the image in a movie-poster style layout:
- Place the title prominently in the center or lower third.
- Place the tagline above or below the title.
- Add a credit block at the bottom in small text.
- Add the release note at the bottom center.

Finally, add the starring section at the bottom, always formatted as:
“Starring: <subject>”

Typography should be bold, dramatic, and genre-appropriate.
The final result must look like a genuine movie poster ready for theaters, with all elements harmonized to the photo’s mood.
entries.review_reason: Complex multimodal prompt requiring image analysis and text generation logic; classified as LAYOUT due to heavy typography/design focus.
